name: github_bulk_scrape_repos
description: Scrape multiple GitHub repositories in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling github_scrape_repo multiple times. Pass repo URLs as a comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const name = document.querySelector('[itemprop="name"], strong[itemprop="name"] a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const owner = document.querySelector('[itemprop="author"] a, .author a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('[itemprop="description"], .f4.my-3')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const stars = document.querySelector('#repo-stars-counter-star, a[href*="/stargazers"] .Counter')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const forks = document.querySelector('#repo-network-counter, a[href*="/forks"] .Counter')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const langEl = document.querySelector('.BorderGrid-row .Progress-item'); const language = langEl ? langEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || '' : ''; return { name: owner + '/' + name, description: desc, stars: stars, forks: forks, language: language, url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: scrape_result
detailSteps.label: Extract repo info
